Interface Executor

public interface Executor
An instance of the executor can execute a script.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Context
    getContext()
    An executor always runs in a context.

    Update an operation that was already loaded from the service loader mechanism.

  • Method Details

    • getContext

      Context getContext()
      An executor always runs in a context. Some code wants to access the context directly.
      Returns:
      the context

    • getOperation

      Optional<Operation> getOperation(String symbol)
      Returns the Operation associated with the specified symbol.

      The engine loads the operations (commands and functions) when it is created using the service loader mechanism.

      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol representing the operation to retrieve
      Returns:
      the operation matching the symbol, or null if not found

    • updateOperation

      void updateOperation(Operation operation)
      Update an operation that was already loaded from the service loader mechanism.

      The operation will replace the one operator in the engine that has the same symbol.

      Parameters:
      operation - the updating operation instance the engine has to use instead of the one loaded from the service loader, or registered earlier

    • registerOperation

      void registerOperation(Operation operation)

    • registerOrUpdateOperation

      void registerOrUpdateOperation(Operation operation)
